message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product that I think you'll love!  I'm asking for $14,000, but I'm open to hearing your thoughts.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $11,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to compromise. How about we meet in the middle at $12,500? This price still allows me some profit while giving you a good deal.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $12,500 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to go up to $12,000, but that's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.
